nodes.text: The Malastare-Sullust Joint Task Force, shortened to Mallust JTF, was a task force that was active during the High Republic Era. Hedda Casset served with distinction within the task force, first being a Z-24 Buzzbug starfighter pilot and then becoming an officer that commanded a heavy cruiser, which was one of the largest in the group. Eventually, Casset left the task force and retired to become a merchant captain. Mallust JTF conducted mostly policing missions against pirates and similar threats in their small sector of the Mid Rim.
